availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew McConnell January and Sarah January. Married Emma Douglas January. Father of Haddie C. January. Merchant in Maysville in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, 2nd Ward Maysville, p. 37. Find A Grave, "Robert Grundy January (1837 - 1863)," Memorial #114178219, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=114178219 (accessed October 4, 2017).
